New here?

Welcome! Since you're new, I would recommend the following songs to you to get a good idea of the kind of stuff I produce: I want to own a coffee shop, My Landlord Sucks and The Right Man in the Wrong Place. But there are way more songs than that, as you'll find out if you click the shiny blue button...

To the musics!
